snippet: Wagner, which is in first place in the Northeast Conference and Staten Island’s lone Division I football team, helped storm victims and gave them something to cheer for.
abstract: Staten Island's lone Division I football team Wagner College regains footing after Hurricane Sandy; is in first place in Northeast Conference heading into nonconference home game against Holy Cross.
lead_paragraph: Wagner, which is in first place in the Northeast Conference and Staten Island’s lone Division I football team, helped storm victims and gave them something to cheer for.

headline.seo: Wagner Football Team Regains Footing After Storm
headline.main: After Storm, Wagner Quickly Regains Footing
headline.print_headline: After Storm, Wagner Quickly Regains Footing
